text: matyaṉi (nakaratti)luḷḷavarkaḷukku, avarkaḷuṭaiya cakōtararākiya ṣu'aipai (nam tūtarāka) aṉuppivaittōm. Avar (avarkaḷiṭam; "eṉ) camūkattavarkaḷē! Allāh (oruvaṉaiyē) niṅkaḷ vaṇaṅkuṅkaḷ. Avaṉaittavira uṅkaḷukku vēṟu nāyaṉillai; aḷavaiyilum niṟuvaiyilum nīṅkaḷ kuṟaivu ceyyātīrkaḷ; nīṅkaḷ nalla nilaiyaiyiliruppatai (ippoḻutu) nāṉ kāṇkiṉṟēṉ; āṉāl (aḷavilum, niṟuvaiyilum nīṅkaḷ mōcam ceytāl) niccayamāka uṅkaḷaic cūḻntu koḷḷakkūṭiya vētaṉai oru nāḷ uṅkaḷai vantaṭaiyum eṉṟu nāṉ payappaṭukiṟēṉ
